name: Spin It
description:
Spin It is an original, simple and challenging game designed to test your timing and reactions. Spin and move deflectors and obstacles to bounce the ball along the path and get to the goal.

The game includes 100 levels in 2 game modes as well as unlimited computer generated levels to test yourself against.

INSTRUCTIONS

Click the left mouse button or press any key to spin and move all deflectors and obstacles.

Bounce the ball along the path and get to the goal to complete the level (Normal Mode) or see how many laps you can complete in Endless Mode.

PS This game is also available for free on iOS and Android

App Store
Google Play
